00001 #include <DataStorage/io_interface.h>
00002 
00003 #include <time.h>

00005 namespace isis

00007 namespace image_io

00010 class ImageFormat_Null: public FileFormat
00011 {
00012     static const size_t timesteps = 20;
00013     std::list<data::Chunk> makeImage( unsigned short size, uint16_t sequence, std::string desc ) {
00014         //##################################################################################################
00015         //## standard null image
00016         //##################################################################################################
00017         std::list<data::Chunk> ret;
00018 
00019         for ( uint32_t t = 0; t < timesteps; t++ ) {
00020             for ( uint32_t s = 0; s < size; s++ ) {
00021 
00022                 data::MemChunk<uint8_t> ch( size, size );
00023                 ch.setPropertyAs( "indexOrigin", util::fvector4( 0, -150 / 2, s * 110. / size - 100 / 2 ) ); //don't use s*100./size-100/2 because we want a small gap
00024                 ch.setPropertyAs<uint16_t>( "sequenceNumber", sequence );
00025                 ch.setPropertyAs( "performingPhysician", std::string( "Dr. Jon Doe" ) );
00026                 ch.setPropertyAs( "rowVec",    util::fvector4(  cos( M_PI / 8 ), -sin( M_PI / 8 ) ) ); //rotated by pi/8
00027                 ch.setPropertyAs( "columnVec", util::fvector4(  sin( M_PI / 8 ),  cos( M_PI / 8 ) ) ); // @todo also rotate the sliceVec
00028                 ch.setPropertyAs( "voxelSize", util::fvector4( 150. / size, 150. / size, 100. / size ) );
00029                 ch.setPropertyAs<uint16_t>( "repetitionTime", 1234 );
00030                 ch.setPropertyAs( "sequenceDescription", desc );
00031 
00032                 for ( int x = 10; x < 40; x++ )
00033                     for ( int y = 10; y < 40; y++ )
00034                         ch.voxel<uint8_t>( x, y ) = 255 - s * 20;
00035 
00036                 ch.voxel<uint8_t>( 0, 0 ) = t * 40;
00037                 ret.push_back( ch );
00038             }
00039         }
00040 
00041         return ret;
00042     }
00043 protected:
00044     std::string suffixes( io_modes /*modes=both*/ )const {
00045         return std::string( ".null" );
00046     }
00047     size_t getSize( const std::string &dialect ) {
00048         size_t size = 10;
00049 
00050         if( !dialect.empty() )
00051             size = boost::lexical_cast<unsigned short>( dialect );
00052 
00053         size = pow( size * 1024 * 1024 / timesteps, 1. / 3. ); //get qubic root for size volumes
00054         return size;
00055     }
00056 public:
00057     std::string getName()const {
00058         return "Null";
00059     }
00060     std::string dialects( const std::string &/*filename*/ )const {
00061         return std::string( "50 500 1000 2000" );
00062     }
00063 
00064     int load ( std::list<data::Chunk> &chunks, const std::string &/*filename*/, const std::string &dialect )  throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00065 
00066         size_t size = getSize( dialect );
00067 
00068         // normal sequencial image
00069         std::list<data::Chunk> ret = makeImage( size, 0, "normal sequencial Image" );
00070         uint32_t s = 0;
00071         BOOST_FOREACH( data::Chunk & ref, ret ) {
00072             ref.setPropertyAs<uint32_t>( "acquisitionNumber", s++ );
00073         }
00074         chunks.insert( chunks.end(), ret.begin(), ret.end() );
00075 
00076         // interleaved image
00077         ret = makeImage( size, 1, "interleaved Image" );
00078         std::list< data::Chunk >::iterator ch = ret.begin();
00079 
00080         for ( uint32_t t = 0; t < timesteps; t++ ) {
00081             //even numbers
00082             for ( uint32_t s = 0; s < ( size / 2. ); s++ ) { //eg. size==5  2 < (5/2.) => 2 < 2.5 == true
00083                 ( ch++ )->setPropertyAs<uint32_t>( "acquisitionNumber", s * 2 + t * size );
00084             }
00085 
00086             //uneven numbers
00087             for ( uint32_t s = 0; s < ( size / 2 ); s++ ) { //eg. size==5  2 < (5/2) => 2 < 2 == false
00088                 ( ch++ )->setPropertyAs<uint32_t>( "acquisitionNumber", s * 2 + 1 + t * size );
00089             }
00090         }
00091 
00092         assert( ch == ret.end() );
00093         chunks.insert( chunks.end(), ret.begin(), ret.end() );
00094 
00095         return timesteps * size;
00096     }
00097 
00098     void write( const data::Image &img, const std::string &/*filename*/, const std::string &/*dialect*/ )  throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00099         data::Image image = img;
00100 
00101         // set by the core, thus the newChunks cannot have one
00102         image.remove( "source" );
00103         image.remove( "voxelGap" );
00104         image.remove( "sliceVec" );
00105 
00106         size_t size = image.getSizeAsVector()[0];
00107         std::list< data::Chunk > newChunks;
00108         std::vector< data::Chunk > oldChunks = image.copyChunksToVector();
00109         std::list< data::Chunk >::iterator iCh;
00110         uint32_t s = 0;
00111 
00112         switch( image.getPropertyAs<int>( "sequenceNumber" ) ) {
00113         case 0: //image 0 is a "normal" image
00114             newChunks = makeImage( size, 0, "normal sequencial Image" );
00115             BOOST_FOREACH( data::Chunk & ref, newChunks ) {
00116                 ref.setPropertyAs<uint32_t>( "acquisitionNumber", s++ );
00117             }
00118             break;
00119         case 1: //image 1 is a "interleaved" image
00120             newChunks = makeImage( size, 1, "interleaved Image" );
00121             iCh = newChunks.begin();
00122 
00123             for ( uint32_t t = 0; t < timesteps; t++ ) {
00124                 //even numbers
00125                 for ( uint32_t s = 0; s < ( size / 2. ); s++ ) { //eg. size==5  2 < (5/2.) => 2 < 2.5 == true
00126                     ( iCh++ )->setPropertyAs<uint32_t>( "acquisitionNumber", s * 2 + t * size );
00127                 }
00128 
00129                 //uneven numbers
00130                 for ( uint32_t s = 0; s < ( size / 2 ); s++ ) { //eg. size==5  2 < (5/2) => 2 < 2 == false
00131                     ( iCh++ )->setPropertyAs<uint32_t>( "acquisitionNumber", s * 2 + 1 + t * size );
00132                 }
00133             }
00134 
00135             assert( iCh == newChunks.end() );
00136             break;
00137         default:
00138             throwGenericError( "unknown Image" );
00139         }
00140 
00141         if( newChunks.size() != oldChunks.size() )
00142             throwGenericError( "ammount of chunks differs" );
00143 
00144         std::list< data::Chunk >::iterator newCH = newChunks.begin();
00145 
00146         for( size_t i = 0; i < oldChunks.size(); ++i, ++newCH ) {
00147             // check for the orientation seperately
00148             if(
00149                 newCH->getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "columnVec" ).fuzzyEqual( oldChunks[i].getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "columnVec" ) ) == false ||
00150                 newCH->getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "rowVec" ).fuzzyEqual( oldChunks[i].getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "rowVec" ) ) == false
00151             ) {
00152                 throwGenericError( "orientation is not equal" );
00153             } else {
00154                 newCH->remove( "rowVec" );
00155                 newCH->remove( "columnVec" );
00156                 oldChunks[i].remove( "rowVec" );
00157                 oldChunks[i].remove( "columnVec" );
00158             }
00159 
00160             util::PropertyMap::DiffMap metaDiff = newCH->getDifference( oldChunks[i] );
00161 
00162             if( metaDiff.size() ) {
00163                 std::cerr << metaDiff << std::endl;
00164                 throwGenericError( "differences in the metainformation found" );
00165             }
00166 
00167             if( newCH->compare( oldChunks[i] ) ) {
00168                 throwGenericError( "voxels do not fit" );
00169             }
00170         }
00171     }
00172     bool tainted()const {return false;}//internal plugins are not tainted
00173 };
00174 }
00175 }
00176 isis::image_io::FileFormat *factory()
00177 {
00178     return new isis::image_io::ImageFormat_Null();
